# string

**Instance Property**

Creates a string by interpreting the component’s content as UTF-8 on Unix and UTF-16 on Windows.

## Declaration

```swift
var string: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is equivalent to calling `String(decoding: component)`.
title: string
